description: {"blocks":[{"key":"47r2r","text":"This protocol includes the guidelines for water sample collection and processing (CEAP samples)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"bd6kj","text":"15-mL centrifuge tubes, polypropylene, conical bottom w/ CentriStar cap, sterile, natural;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1jh","text":"0.45 µm pore size, hydrophilic PVDF membrane filter;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jo58","text":"30-mL sterile syringes;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"708me","text":"0.45 µm syringe filters;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg6if","text":"60-mL Nalgene Square wide-mouth HDPE bottles; ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc03p","text":"2-L HDPE bottles;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7sjr","text":"Sampling pole;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60mn0","text":"Disposable covered 50 mm petri dishes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19gma","text":"Magnetic stirring bar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16t3e","text":"250-mL volumetric flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aunta","text":"Turkey baster","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csm6g","text":"Filtration manifold","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ndfg","text":"Magnetic cylinders","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67m0k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8m5s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_equipments.name: OHAUS™ Explorer™ Semi-Micro Balance or equivalent

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dq2q","text":"This standard operating procedure (SOP) describes the procedure for the collection and processing of water samples in the Snake River Basin. Water samples are collected often for assessing water quality in the irrigation return flows to the Snake River. The samples are analyzed for pH, electrical conductivity (EC), total suspended solids (TSS), total Kjeldahl nitrogen (N), FIA-analyzed nitrate, ammonia and chloride, and digested for ICP analysis of Al, Ca, Fe, K, Mg, Na, P, S, and Zn. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"65tej","text":"Labelling bottles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rvf6","text":"Pipette    of    or   boric acid solution into centrifuge tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"95t8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"5AB2C4702FB311EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"819350002FB311EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"6.2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"F1C2D2D0307411EDA6151F903454B8A7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcho7","text":"Label 2-L bottles and 60-mL bottles with sample location and sample number","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bqf5","text":"Label 15-mL centrifuge tubes with the sample location, sample number ,date and initials. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3krvl","text":"Petri dishes and filter membranes: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vjo0","text":" {"blocks":[{"key":"f6ps","text":"Place 2-L bottle in the sample rod. Submerge bottle into stream and filling it twice and discarding the water to rinse bottle. Collect sample by lowering bottle through the entire depth of stream. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3opd9","text":"Lay out petri dishes and add one membrane filter to each dish. Place then","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tor3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gmlq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br3mv","text":" in the oven at      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7CEA61D32FB411EDB1210A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7CEA628D2FB411EDB1210A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kigp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ps7f","text":"Place petri dishes in the desiccator. Apply vacuum until it stops hissing, and disconnect vacuum tubing. Turn the valve to maintain vacuum. Keep the dishes in the desiccator for   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":178,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ggdd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"AB005D602FB411EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f5i6s","text":"Weigh petri dishes + filter. Record weights in the worksheet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t6oo","text":"Sample filtering will depend on the number of sampling locations to be visited. If samples are collecting in one location only (e.g., water quality ponds), samples are to be filtered on site. If more sampling locations are to be visited (e.g. CEAP samples), all 2-L samples are brought into the lab and filtering will occur on the day or day after of collection. Unfiltered samples need to be stored in walk-in cooler if not filtered on the same day of collection. The steps for filtering are described below: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h3pb","text":"Transfer a 15-mL aliquot of water sample from the 2-L bottle using a syringe. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5dal","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vprb","text":"Attach a 0.45 µm syringe filter and filter the water into a 15-mL centrifuge tube containing boric acid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93fln","text":"Filtered samples are to be stored in the refrigerator in Room 119 until analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abopc","text":"When 2-L water samples are at room temperature, measure pH and EC using the pH and EC meters in the Annex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"952g3","text":"pH and EC meters must be calibrated before measuring. For EC, use 84 and 1413 µS/cm calibrators. For pH, use the 7 and 10 calibrators.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92v1","text":"Transfer a 50-mL aliquot of water sample from the 2-L bottle to the 50-mL bottles and store them in the refrigerator in Room 119 until TKN analysis. This step can also be conducted during the TSS analysis, if preferred. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6st4j","text":"Place blank 0.45 µm membrane filters on each of the cylinder attachments on the filtration manifold using tweezers. Cover with the plastic cylinders. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dlbl","text":"Collect a   aliquot using the turkey baster into the volumetric flask and transfer it to the vacuum cylinder. The final amount of water that is filtered for TSS determination will depend on the amount of sediment in the sample. I there's little sediment, the volume filtered should be increased (i.e., if the volume added of water sample is filtered in less than ~2 minutes, add another   of sample to cylinder). For high-sediment samples, the volume to be filtered will need to be reduced to    or   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":387,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":493,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":499,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"acu28","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"657467E02FBF11EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"448EED702FBF11EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"CBCC5B602FBF11EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"D3E89ED02FBF11EDADB8C77E790D5F7B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ec9s","text":"Place water sample on stirrer and stir until vortex is formed and the sediment is in suspension. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eluko","text":"Apply vacuum to manifold by opening the valves for the cylinders being used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fqos","text":"Rinse the graduated cylinder with DI water and add that volume to the vacuum cylinder to account for the residual sediment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"br6q0","text":"Once sample filtering is complete, remove the cylinders, and place the membrane filters back onto the Petri dishes using the tweezers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bmsd","text":"Rinse cylinders, turkey baster, magnetic stirrer, and volumetric flask before moving to the next sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Water sample collection and processing
